io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.gui

Class Container

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.gui.Component
      • io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.gui.Container
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Layout, Screen, ScrollableContainer, TabbedContainer

    public class Container
extends Component
    A component that can hold other components.
    Author:
    Tomaso2468

    • Method Detail

      • getSelected

        public Component getSelected(float x,
                             float y)
        Gets the component at the specified mouse position. This function will also check containers held within this container so children of the returned component should not be containers.
        Parameters:
        x - The X position of the mouse.
        y - The Y position of the mouse.
        Returns:
        A component held in this component or this component if no it is the only visible component.

        public void debugComponents(Graphics g,
                            float scaling)
        Debugs all components in this container.
        Parameters:

        scaling - The scaling factor for rendering.

      • add

        public void add(Component c)
        Adds a component to this container.. This may trigger a layout change.
        Parameters:
        c - The component to add.
